17046.<if_woman>「さっすが <pc>！\n 話の わかる女だぜ！<else>:
Way to go! You're a <if_woman>girl<else>guy<endif>
who knows what they're talking about!

17047.<if_woman>「ロマンの わかる女だぜ！<else>「ロマンの わかる男だ:
<if_woman>I'm a woman who understands romance!
<else>I'm a man who understands romance!
<endif>

17050.「あの封印された書物は あたしと\n <pc>さんが 見つけたんですよ。\n ３:
It's not fair for the three of us to be
alone...

17051.「フンッ。ようし いいだろう！\n それでは チビのアカシを加えて\n 改めて:
Hmmm. All right, all right! So, with the
addition of little Akashi, we are once again
Formation! Leaf Explorers!

17052.「よく聞け 隊員たちよ！\n 我々の目的は この村の地下にあるという\n 謎の部:
Attention, men! Our objective is to discover
the mysterious God's Hall, which is located in
the basement of this village.

17056.「すぐに 聞き込みに出発せよ！\n 諸君らの はたらきに 期待しているぞ！:
Go to the house to ask people in! We're
counting on you to do your job!

17057.「へえ…… これが 知恵の社で見つかった\n 封印された書物なのかい？:
So... this is the sealed book found in the
Shrine of Wisdom?

17058.「は はいっ！ ハジカ先生。\n その…… 先生なら この本が\n どれくらい古:
Ha, yes! Mr. Hajika. I was wondering if you
could tell me how old this book is...

17061.「……なるほど 状況は わかった。\n 君たち探検隊の ヒントになるような助言が:
Well, I see where you're going. I don't know
if I can offer any advice that might help you
explorers, but...

17062.「この書物に ほどこされていた\n 封印の術式と 劣化具合から言って およそ\n:
The sealing technique used to seal this book
and the degree of deterioration suggest that
it is approximately 300 years old.

17063.「……３００年前といえば このツスクルの村に\n 学びの庭が つくられた時代のは:
...300 years ago would be about the time when
the village's Garden of Learning was
built. Interesting coincidence, no?

17064.「つまり……学びの庭が つくられたころには\n まだ 神代の間が 使われていたっ:
Does this mean that the God's Hall was still
in use when the Garden of Learning was built?

17065.「それにしても すごいじゃないか。\n <pc>君といったか……\n よく こん:
Still, it's amazing. I don't know how you
found such a book, <pc>.

17066.「はんっ！ こっちだって 負けてないぜ！ \n 先生 見てくれよ！ これ コノタ:
Ha-ha! We're not losing! Hey, Doc, check this
out! This is a very old, very nice love letter
Konota found!

17069.「授業で習ったことなんですが……\n ３００年前の 学びの庭の建設には\n ある:
I learned in class that a family of architects
was involved in the construction of the Garden
of Learning 300 years ago.

17070.「一族の名は ドン家。 \n ドワチャッカ大陸の ドルワーム王国に\n 今も続く:
The name of the family is the Don family. They
are a family of famous architects who continue
to this day in Kingdom of Dolworm.

17071.「その ドン家を訪ねれば 当時の\n 村の記録が 残っているかもしれません。\n:
If you visit the Don family, you may be able to find some records of the village at that time. Maybe we can find out something about
God's Hall!

17072.「どうです？ 名推理じゃありませんか？: What do you think? Isn't it a good guess?

17073.「まあ 悪くないアイディアだ。\n 隊員たちよ！ さっそくドルワームに出発せよ！:
Well, not a bad idea. Troops! Set out for
Dolworm at once! We're going to visit the Don
family, the architects!

17074.「隊長は この学びの庭で 報告を待つ。\n 諸君らの はたらきに 期待しているぞ:
The captain waits for your report in this
garden of learning. We are counting on you to
work hard!

17075.「はいはい 偉大な建築家 ドン・パパチョなら\n ワシのことだけども。ははあ……:
Yes, yes, if you're looking for the great architect, Don Papacho, you found him. Ah, You're looking for the mysterious room
under Tsusukul Village?

17076.「そりゃまた オツなことを してるねえ。\n いいよ いいよ。昔の図面とか\n:
That's a very cool thing you're doing. It's
okay, it's okay. There must be some old
drawings or something left. I'll look for it.

17077.「はい おまたせ。\n これが ３００年前に描かれた\n 学びの庭の 設計図さ。:
Here you go. This is a 300-year-old blueprint
of the Garden of Learning.

17078.「たしかに 当時 ツスクルの村の地下には \n 神代の間って部屋が あったみたい:
It is true that there was a room called God's
Hall in the basement of Tsusukul Village at
that time.

17080.「昔 ツスクルの村の地下には\n 迷宮が 広がっていたらしいね。\n その奥に:
I heard that a long time ago, there was a
maze spread out beneath this village. Looks
like there was a divine room behind it.

17081.「学びの庭は その迷宮の真上に建てられた。\n そして 迷宮の入り口は\n 職員:
The Garden of Learning was built right above the labyrinth. And the entrance to the labyrinth seems to have remained in the staff
quarters.

17082.「それが ここ……。\n 桜の間って呼ばれてる 部屋みたいよ。: This room is called the cherry blossom room.

17084.「桜の間は…… 妙なウワサが絶えないから \n 使われなくなったっていう\n い:
The Cherry Blossom Room... is said to have
fallen into disuse because of the strange
rumors that keep circulating.

17085.「あ あの部屋だけは ダメだ！\n あそこに行くのは 絶対ヤバイって！！\n だ:
Oh, no, not that room! It's definitely not
safe to go there! Because...! I saw it too.

17086.「お…… 女の幽霊を…………。: Oh... a ghost of a woman...

17087.「あははっ！ そんなの 見まちがいですよ。\n そんなことより 神代の間の あり:
Ha-ha-ha! You're looking at it all wrong. But
that doesn't matter, we finally found out
where the God's Hall is!

17088.「さあ はやく 学びの庭に 帰りましょう。\n シシノタに 教えてあげなくちゃ！:
Come on, let's get back to the Garden of
Learning. We must teach Shishinota!

17089.「ないっ！ ないない！\n たしかに ここに置いたのに\n どこに いっちまった:
No! It's gone! I put it here, but where did it
go...!

17091.「す…すまん コノタ。 \n オレたちの宝が…… \n ラブレターが 消えちまっ:
I'm sorry, Konota. Our treasure... our love
letters... disappeared.

17092.「ええええ～～！！ なんでだよ！\n あんちゃんの アホンダラ！！\n この ス:
Eeeeeeee~! Why the hell did you do that! You,
asshole! You Slime brain!

17093.「うるせえバカ！ もう いいだろ。\n 今じゃ 神代の間が ブームなんだから。\:
Shut up, you idiot! That's enough. God's Hall
is booming right now. So...did you get any
luck with Dolworm?

17094.「そうか そうか。でかしたぞ 隊員たち！\n 職員宿舎にある 桜の間が 神代の間:
Oh, yeah, yeah. Well done, troops! So the cherry blossom room in the staff dormitory is the entrance to the underground labyrinth that
leads to the God's Hall.

17095.「ダ……ダメだよ。やめよう あんちゃん！\n あの部屋には 女の幽霊が 出るんだ:
N-no. Let's stop it, bro! They say there's
a female ghost in that room! I really saw it!

17096.「ハイハイ お前のことだから\n どうせ なにかと 見まちがえたんだろ。:
Since it's you, you probably mistook it for
something, didn't you?

17097.「諸君！ まずは 長旅ご苦労であった！\n 君たちの優秀な はたらきにより\n:
Gentlemen! First of all, thank you for your long journey! Thanks to your excellent work, the entrance to the God's Hall has finally
been revealed.

17098.「諸君らの 功績をたたえ\n これを授けよう。受け取れい！:
In honor of your achievements, I give you
this. Take it!

17099.「はっはっは。おどろいたか。\n ちゃーんと報酬を 用意しておいたのだ。\n こ:
Ha-ha-ha. Surprised? I have prepared a reward
for you. It's part of being a captain!

17100.「さて。まずは 長旅の疲れを いやすがよい。\n 充分に休んだら また探検に出発:
First of all, you should recover from the the fatigue of your long journey. After you've had enough rest, let's go exploring again!
Dismissed!

17101.「ちがうんだ…… ちがうんだよ。\n オイラ 本当に 幽霊を見たんだ……。: No, no, no, no. I really did see a ghost...

17102.「あの雨の日……オイラは\n 授業をサボって 昼寝でもしようと思って\n 桜の間:
That rainy day... I decided to skip class and
take a nap, so I walked up to the cherry
blossom trees.

17103.「そしたら その時 ちょうど雷が落ちて……: And just then, a bolt of lightning struck...

17104.「窓に 白い女の顔が\n 浮かんでるのが 見えたんだ……。:
I saw a white woman's face floating in the
window.
